lenders.name: Bryan
lenders.loan_because: I want to see others succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at the University of Kansas, School of Journalism.  I help journalism students learn multimedia reporting skills as well as manage some newsroom activity for our educational TV station: KUJH-TV.

lenders.name: Tracie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help!

lenders.name: Sonia
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the US government.  I serve as a "judge" (hearing officer) in administrative hearings involving agricultural issues.

lenders.name: Randi
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help now and then. If I can afford to provide some relief, I feel that I should.

lenders.name: Shriya
lenders.loan_because: I earned gift money from a graduation dance performance and I wanted to donate it to an organization where $1500 would make a big difference in someone's life from somewhere else in the world and I thought Kiva would be best! :)
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student. My hobbies are dance, traveling, art, music, writing, photography, costume design, writing, and cooking.

lenders.name: Diego
lenders.loan_because: We can make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: International merchant

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: Jesus said, "What you do for least of these...you do for Me."
lenders.occupational_info: I serve a pastor in a large church with assistance and coordination of projects; I also have a small administrative services business.

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others and encourage independence and sustainability.  We're all in the same boat...(Earth)
lenders.occupational_info: I design "green" or sustainable buildings incorporating local, natural materials, renewable energy, and sunlight.

lenders.name: Jud and Darcy
lenders.loan_because: Earning is foundational

lenders.name: BAMBANG
lenders.loan_because: need for working capital to grow up my shoes retail and shoes/sandal production.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been at his business for last a year, it growth slowly, because I make a start from zero (nothing). Now I have make wide range conectiont , local and international, but still need some working capital to growth.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I see this kind of loaning as teaching a woman to fish, rather than just giving her the fish.

lenders.name: Ina
lenders.loan_because: I believe that when you give, you receive much more in return!

lenders.name: Fred
lenders.occupation: Independent Distributor for Send Out Cards
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurship and capitalism can cure poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an independent distributor for a product that helps people send cards and gifts in the mail to thier friends, family and business contacts by using their computer. I also assist those on my team in setting up their own business doing the same thing.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I can. I don't make a lot of money, but I make enough and I'd like to help someone else get to a point where they can afford to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital kitchen, bringing a smile to patients faces while delivering their meal to them and helping them make the right diet choices.

lenders.name: Such A Voice
lenders.occupation: Voice Over Training and Demo Production
lenders.loan_because: it feels great to help people reach their dreams!
lenders.occupational_info: We are a voice-over training & demo recording production company. We give people the voice-over technique training and mentor them through setting up their voice-over business so that they can become professionals in their local area.

lenders.name: Ryland
lenders.occupational_info: Searching for new homes or a quality new home builder? Talk to the home experts at Ryland today

lenders.name: Secrets From Your Sister
lenders.loan_because: We want to encourage our customers to use environmentally friendly shopping bags and to give back to the community.  We allocate $1 from each bag sale to loans for Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a specialty bra-fitting boutique that educates women about finding the right size bra.  We encourage women of every size to feel empowered and beautiful.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I believe economic development helps everybody.
lenders.occupational_info: I work helping resolve problems with trades

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I consider myself and my success "self made," but I have had key pieces of help along the way. I would like to provide some key pieces of help to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I make things for web sites - all kinds of things. :-)

lenders.name: Page
lenders.loan_because: It's one of the ways I know to serve my fellow humans. It reminds me to be grateful for my own blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people overcome difficulties from their past and present, individually and in their relationships.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I want others to have a fair chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: My passion to to educate and inspire teens about agriculture.

lenders.name: Renada
lenders.loan_because: I respect entrepreneurs. My husband and I  have our own business so I know it takes more than hard work; it takes capital.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of people's pets while they are out of town.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: as an entrepreneur, I know how difficult it can be for start-up and small businesses to secure capital.
lenders.occupational_info: We help companies "Go Global and Grow Global"

lenders.name: Otto
lenders.occupational_info: Stop and smell everything. Treat each day as a new one. Make the most of each opportunity presented to you

lenders.name: ADELE
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people take charge of their lives.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: it is important to give others the opportunities that I have been so fortunate to have in part by accident of where I was born.
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze the patterns and interactions within a geographic context to improve decision making.
